blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups

summary: Would you mind doing a scenario or headcanon where shinsou meets aizawa's niece during their training and the two of them hit it...
question: Would you mind doing a scenario or headcanon where shinsou meets aizawa's niece during their training and the two of them hit it off and aizawa gets protective and nags him but approves. And would you also mind a tamaki  x reader with angst that ends in fluff in which he thinks she likes mirio but she's actually in love with him. thank you for your time.
answer:
I’ve written some headcanons similar to the Shinsou one, the only difference is S/O being Aizawa’s daughter instead. So here’s the link to that! https://bnhagalposts.tumblr.com/post/181092029021/hello-there-what-do-you-think-would-happen-if


But here’s the Tamaki headcanon request!


-Tamaki has always been self-conscious and nervous, so seeing his crush turn red and laugh around Mirio caused sadness in his heart.

-Tamaki couldn’t even be mad at the whole situation because he believed that Mirio was the better man for them. Tamaki was just an anxious, introverted person who had trouble voicing his feelings while Mirio was extroverted and positive.

-Tamaki hated though feeling jealous of his best friend, just seeing the person he loves, talk so cheerfully made his confidence drop. Tamaki just kept his feelings to himself and let his heart drop at the sight of his crush.

-Mirio noted that he looked more crestfallen lately, Tamaki hated that he could pick up on his feelings. His crush gave him some of his favorite food to cheer him up but, it only made his heart hurt that he knew he would never be able to voice his love.

-A day after class, Mirio and S/O walked off a notebook falling from S/O’s bag. It opened on a page that showcased hearts around his name and a small plan on how to confess to him. Tamaki was immediately hit by confusion, they liked him and not Mirio?

-Another day after, S/O asked to speak in private and with a reddened face confessed their feelings to Tamaki, Tamaki remained silent and shocked. They awkwardly gazed around, waiting for Tamaki’s answer. Tamaki gulped “I like you too but, why? What about Mirio?”

-”Mirio has been helping me sort through my feelings with you and he’s been teasing me a bit. But Tamaki there are so many reasons I like you.” They smiled, flushed. They softly touched his hands, holding them. Tamaki felt his lips twist up into a nervous but, happy smile.



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia

summary: I usually see people post about dadzawa reactions to physical abuse, but how would dadzawa/dadmic/dadmight handle the situation...
question: I usually see people post about dadzawa reactions to physical abuse, but how would dadzawa/dadmic/dadmight handle the situation if they noticed that a student was being emotionally abused by their parents?  (like the student always expects to be yelled at, freaks out when someone raises their voice, and bursts into tears anytime they make a tiny mistake.)
answer:
Hizashi:

-He definitely would attempt to quiet his voice, despite his quirk and personality and he would apologize if he ever spoke too loudly.

-Hizashi most certainly would comfort you, though he would make sure your fine with a few hugs and comforting words.

-Hizashi would always listen if you needed to talk and he would compliment you for your bravery.

-He’s one who steps in when it comes to your parents. He wishes for the little listener to be safe and feel loved.

-Hizashi would be by your side at all times and is ready to protect you from loud noises and insults.



Aizawa:

-He would discretely warn other teachers to not be so loud.

-Aizawa would work to manage your case and offers some awkward but, sweet words.

-Aizawa is a blunt person so he might not be as blunt with you but, he would still make sure his point gets across.

-Aizawa isn’t the best at comforting people but, you ever need a few cute pictures of his cats just ask him.

-He would assure you that you are a strong person and would offer you a place to stay while the whole legal process happens.



Toshinori:

-This man is ready to keep you safe and he most certainly makes sure he is quieter near you.

-He would be the one to assure you that be will always be there and he would never break your trust and never insult you.

-He knows not everything fixes itself right away but, he tries his hardest to make your situation better and he would hug you and let you cry out your feelings.

-Toshinori knows a few coping techniques to help with anxiety attacks (since as a hero you need to know these things). He would teach them to you and attempt to offer his help.

-He would never hand out fake compliments but, he might compliment you more on your strength to assure you that you are a great person.



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia
